channel.title: List of Secure Computation Papers
channel.description: A list of papers on IACR eprint on the topic of secure computation.

item.title: Embedding Multiplications at a Linear Rate and its Applications
item.description: Alexander R. Block and Hemanta K. Maji and Hai H. Nguyen

item.title: 3PC ORAM with Low Latency, Low Bandwidth, and Fast Batch Retrieval
